sentences.en: A 63 - year - old woman complained of general malaise and insomnia initially.
sentences.cn: 摘要一位63 岁 妇人主诉全身无力、失眠,而来院求诊.

sentences.en: A protracted malaise will spawn an angry search for scapegoats.
sentences.cn: 这种不满情绪会不断扩大去寻找替罪羊.

sentences.en: Aches and pains and a general physical malaise are also very common.
sentences.cn: 意志消沉者还会出现各种各样的疼痛,或者是周身不适的症状.

sentences.en: Calcium deficiency is the main cause of this malaise.
sentences.cn: 钙剂缺乏是引起这种疾病的主要原因.

sentences.en: General malaise or weakness, inability to perform activities of daily living.
sentences.cn: 感觉不舒服或虚弱而影响一般日常的生活起居.

sentences.en: He complained of depression, headaches and malaise.
sentences.cn: 他主诉自己情绪低落，头痛且身体不适。

sentences.en: He complained of depression, headaches, and malaise.
sentences.cn: 他说他有情绪低落、头痛和不安的症状。
我感觉 ( 有些 ) 不舒服.

sentences.en: Popular malaise has certainly been simmering for a while.
sentences.cn: 普遍的不安必然经过了一阵子的发酵.

sentences.en: Stock prices have fallen considerably during the current economic malaise.
sentences.cn: 股票价格因为当前的金融危机已大幅度下跌.

sentences.en: The continued economic malaise has also stoked resentment against bankers and bonuses.
sentences.cn: 持续的经济困境也越发刺激了公众对银行家和奖金的不满情绪.

sentences.en: The whole May, steel sales are continuing malaise, profits are gradually compressed.
sentences.cn: 整个5月, 钢材销售都持续萎靡, 利润被步步压缩.

sentences.en: There is no easy short-term solution to Britain's chronic economic malaise.
sentences.cn: 短期内迅速治愈英国经济顽症的灵丹妙药并不存在。

sentences.en: This universal uniformity contributed to his malaise.
sentences.cn: 这种千篇一律的格式,使他感到很不舒服.

sentences.en: You can see signs of ( a creeping ) malaise in our office.
sentences.cn: 在我们办公室里可以看到有某种 ( 令人不寒而栗的 ) 不安迹象.

sentences.en: You can see signs of malaise in our office.
sentences.cn: 在我们办公室里可以看到有某种不安迹象.

trans.tran_cn: 不适，不舒服，莫名的不安，萎靡不振，潜在的不满意识
trans.tran_en: a general feeling that you are slightly ill or not happy in your life
